LoanApplicantAddress.name: LoanApplicantAddress
LoanApplicantAddress.description: Represents borrower's or co-borrower's current address information.

AddressExtIdentifier.description: ID that uniquely identifies imported data in an external data source (if applicable). This field is unique within your organization.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LoanApplicantId.description: Borrower associated with this applicant address.

LoanApplicationId.description: Loan application associated with this applicant address.

ResidenceAdditionalMonthCount.description: Additional months borrower lived at this residence.

ResidenceGeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically provides this value based on the address’s latitude and longitude coordinates.

ResidenceLatitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

ResidenceLongitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal places.

ResidenceYearCount.description: Years borrower lived at this residence.

ResidencyType.description: Identifies borrower's residency status at address.
